channel.title: Finaly but there is a problem
channel.description: after so many months i finaly found a good source and client and i jarred them and signed them and it did work and i changed the ip to my no-ip but it says error connecting to server any help?

item.title: Finaly but there is a problem
item.dc:creator: @Nicksworld Nicksworld
item.description:
@Nicksworld wrote:

Are you running duc and making sure you have the ip selected in duc to be on?
also try to get a friend to connect instead i cant connect to my server when its running on no-ip so yeah.
if your friends can connect just change the ip back to 127.0.0.1 and than connect and when you update change it back to your no-ip so your friends can stay connecting.
